title: Bond - Connecting entrepreneurs
description: Connecting all things local. Empowering local businesses & communities to increase loyalty on a digital platform using virtual coins.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposers have a social business product they want to build and have added a document to the attachments. They have submitted the same thing into 6 categories, all with the same limited information and most with the same text. Please apply with a project which explains how your product fits with Cardano and how it addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no plan on what will actually be made and how it empowers entrepreneurs. Please provide a project plan on what you will produce and what the funds will be used for.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no detailed plan of what the funds will be used to produce which can be assessed against. Thus progress and success cannot be measured. It is not clear what, if anything has already been built.

f6_assessments.q0:
This was submitted to the DLT Entrepreneurship Toolbox challenge and it's supposed to answer the question "How can early stage entrepreneurs develop their skills to execute & communicate great ideas so voters/stakeholders value the project?"

It doesn't.

It's actually hard to say what the proposer suggests to do with this. Cool website, great idea, nice video but what does it have to do with this challenge? More meat around the bones needed and perhaps submission to the dApp challenge later.
f6_assessments.q1: I have experience of evaluating technologies for loyalty programs, I work in the IT consultancy field and I've seen the struggle of local entrepreneurs so I can confirm that what the company does is really precious. Hope to have this as a full-fledged proposal in Fund7.
f6_assessments.q2: It is completely unclear what the 7,500 USD would be used for.

f6_assessments.q0: First of all, you submitted it into the wrong challenge, you should submit it to "F6: DApps & Integrations". So please check the challenges in the Future Funds and select it appropriately.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer states to have 15 years in startups, platforms and marketplace, but there are no details. Moreover there are no details on the project and it's not clear even on this site and video, are they related to prosper or he puts them as an example. If the proposer just forgot to write a detailed plan, let's hope to see more details in the future challenges.
f6_assessments.q2: There are no details neither on the funds nor on the plan how they will be used. Therefore audit won't be possible

f6_assessments.q0:
This solution is for Community Bond which is an app connecting clients to local business. The proposal does not provide any skill training to entrepreneurs.
Based upon my experience, I strongly disagree that this proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal does not provide any details about how businesses would make use of their their services or what the requested funds would be used for. 
Based upon my experience, I disagree that it is highly likely that this proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal does not provide a roadmap, auditable milestones or a defined timeline. 
Based upon my experience, I strongly disagree that this proposal provides me with sufficient information to assess the progress in attaining its stated goals.

f6_assessments.q0:
A problem hasn't been defined in the problem statement. The proposal doesn't show a relationship with the challenge.

The same proposal was submitted in 5 different challenges.

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Community-Bond-CRM-for-SME-s/369180-48088

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Community-Bond-CRM-tool-for-SME/369960-48088

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Bond-Connecting-entrepreneurs/369964-48088

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Community-Bond-Metadata/369982-48088

https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Community-Bond-Loyalty-Rewards/369978-48088

A generic plan was presented and not compatible with the Catalyst proposals, there is no mention of Cardano, how and why blockchain technology will be used in the project. I believe that the plan in the attachment was not created for Catalyst.

How can 5 identical proposals have different budgets?

Proposals in Catalyst need to be created in the context of the challenge they are allocated. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is unfinished. While the attached presentation explains a lot, the proposal really is not a fully actionable plan.
f6_assessments.q1: No real plan is presented, and while some team members are introduced, it is sure whether they will be up to the challenge with the big amount of proposals they posted.
f6_assessments.q2: While the concept is described, key metrics snd proper milestones are missing. Also, the difference between the various sub-proposals is not explained well.

solution: SME's and local businesses have limited resources, skills and time to manage their customer loyalty and marketing. Bond automates that.
experience: \+ 15 years in startups, platforms and marketplaces. Social media and other international marketing experience.
